message: Bob, I'm pleased to offer you the exclusive opportunity to acquire this truly unique product. Given its immense value and potential, I'm confident it will exceed your expectations. I propose a price of $1,800,000.  What are your thoughts?

I appreciate your time and consideration, Alice. I'm very interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1,600,000. I believe this price is more reasonable given the value you mentioned earlier. Would you be willing to meet me at this price?
Bob, I understand your perspective on the price. However, the value this product brings is truly exceptional and rare.  I'm willing to meet you halfway. How about $1,700,000?

I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, Alice. However, I'm still a bit hesitant about the price. I'm willing to go up to $1,650,000, but I'm not sure I can go any higher than that. Would you be willing to consider this price?
